00022 namespace MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin {
00023 
00028 class ICertContainer {
00029 public:
00030   virtual ~ICertContainer() {}
00031 
00038   virtual const ByteT& GetCertType() const = 0;
00039 
00048   virtual bool SetCertType(const ByteT& type) = 0;
00049 
00054   virtual const ByteSeq& GetCertificate() const = 0;
00055 
00064   virtual bool SetCertificate(const ByteSeq& cert) = 0;
00065 
00075   virtual bool MPEG2Encode(ByteSeq& encoded) const {
00076     encoded = ByteSeq(GetCertType()) + GetCertificate().MPEG2Encode();
00077     return true;
00078   }
00079 };
00080 
00085 class ISigCertContainer {
00086 public:
00087   virtual ~ISigCertContainer() {}
00088 
00093   virtual const ByteSeq& GetSignature() const = 0;
00094 
00103   virtual bool SetSignature(const ByteSeq& sig) = 0;
00104 
00109   virtual const std::vector<ICertContainer*>& GetCertContainers() const = 0;
00110 
00119   virtual bool CreateCertContainer(ICertContainer** container) = 0;
00120 
00128   virtual const Bit128T& GetVerifyingToolID() const = 0;
00129 
00139   virtual bool SetVerifyingToolID(const Bit128T& verify) = 0;
00140 
00150   virtual bool MPEG2Encode(ByteSeq& encoded) const {
00151     if (GetCertContainers().size() >= (1 << 8)) {
00152       /*  This shouldn't happen. It means that we have more certificate
00153           containers than allowed (cause number of certificate containers
00154           must be packed as a byte).
00155       */
00156       return false;
00157     }
00158     ByteT nCerts = (ByteT)GetCertContainers().size();
00159     encoded = GetSignature().MPEG2Encode() + ByteSeq(nCerts);
00160     std::vector<ICertContainer*>::const_iterator iter = GetCertContainers().begin();
00161     while (iter != GetCertContainers().end()) {
00162       ByteSeq tmp;
00163       if ((*iter)->MPEG2Encode(tmp) == false) {
00164         return false;
00165       }
00166       encoded += tmp;
00167       iter++;
00168     }
00169     encoded += ByteSeq(GetVerifyingToolID());
00170     return true;
00171   }
00172 };
00173 
00174 } // namespace MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin

00176 } // namespace DRMPlugin
